subject: p12952223
Findings: The patient is status post median sternotomy and coronary bypass surgery. Heart remains enlarged, and is accompanied by pulmonary vascular congestion. Interval improved aeration at both lung bases with improving atelectasis and decreasing pleural effusions. No new areas of consolidation within either lung.
